name: Rafael Albuquerque
description:
Hello world.

I'm a web developer, full-time dreamer, music addict, soon-to-be king of the world and other things I can't really remember at the moment.

This is just a landing page with useless information. Yes, I don't have anything relevant to put here.

You may find me on every social network under the name of rafaqueque. I'm pretty sure you'll be amazed by the things I publish.

Or not. Feel free to contact me at c.rafael.s.albuquerque@gmail.com
